entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
